content: *one single ball of yarn makes this stylish scarf lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # cctq-oneskeinscarf *pdf date march 2002* skill level easy chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 100 yards *longer scarf or shawl requires additional 100 yards * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm scarf is worked lengthwise pattern includes directions on how to make this scarf longer wider or into a shawl
